item.title: A glimpse of the future - The day Cursor closed my Linear ticket
item.author: Alex Spanos
item.description:
Everything worked on the first try. I had just watched an AI coding agent complete my data task end-to-end with minimal input from me.

I want to share this story and some reflections because it really brought home to me how software development workflows are changing in real time. My “profound moment” happened whilst working on a dbt project (pre Fusion) in Cursor back in May this year. The company I worked for used Linear for project management - a breath of fresh air compared to other tools I’ve used in the past.
